title: Sion Bug on ARAM
body:
I was playing ARAM and the enemy  had a Sion on their team.
When we kill Sion, it doesn't show the kill confirmation message; like who killed him.
However, the double kill/triple kill still comes up.

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Prepare your screens, if you have any.
